item.title: Build a Jupyter Book
item.description: Installation First, I assume you already have Python >= 3.8 and Git installed. Now install jupyter-book package as follows pip install -U jupyter-book Double-check if the installation was done correctly jupyter-book --help Process of building a book Create your content: folders, files, and configuration Build your book: convert your content to HTML or PDF Publish your book: bring it online Create a book You might have multiple books. Thus, create a folder for all of your book projects first, for example
